techmeme.title: Meta rolls out its Account Status feature to Threads, letting users see when the company has removed or demoted posts or handed out other penalties (Karissa Bell/Engadget)
Alibaba researchers detail ZeroSearch, a technique allowing LLMs to develop advanced search capabilities via simulation, claiming it cuts costs by up to 88% (Michael Nuñez/VentureBeat)
Trump threatens to end the Digital Equity Act, a Biden-era law aimed at expanding high-speed internet access, calling it "racist" and "totally unconstitutional" (Chris Cameron/New York Times)

Cloudflare reports Q1 revenue up 27% YoY to $479.1M, vs. $469.3M est., and forecasts Q2 revenue of $500M to $501M, vs. $500.4M est.; NET jumps 8%+ after hours (Reinhardt Krause/Investor's Business ...)
Senate hearing: Sam Altman says that requiring government approval to release AI would be "disastrous" for the US' lead in AI, a reversal from his 2023 comments (Washington Post)
